switchy.modules.elegantarmour.armour.des: A module that switches armour customisation from AmyMialee's Elegant Armour.
switchy.modules.elegantarmour.armour.ena: You will have armour customisation settings per-preset.
switchy.modules.elegantarmour.armour.dis: You will have the same armour customisation settings for all presets.
switchy.modules.elegantarmour.armour.war: All other armour customisation settings will be cleared!
